title: Can't comment on boards because I'm "not level 7" despite this account being level 30
body: This is a known bug? Please fix, just posting this because apparently that's how you "fix" this issue.

replies.body: Just a syncing issue, you should be okay now.  We did create a new tool for players to [auto-sync](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool), though.  :D  It's pinned on top of the boards.
